response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which we believe holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Recognizing the importance of making this opportunity accessible, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this exceptional product at a special price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that both parties benefit and that you receive unparalleled value while allowing me to maximize the return on this unique offering. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss further details. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 950000}
